column2: an A.M. Eatery////Had the eggs Benedict duo with one classic and one Bella
column5: and perfectly poached eggs on toasted ciabatta
column7: balsamic glaze and arugula). Oh my
column8: was it good.  The flavors were excellent.  I munched through both of them.  The only huge drawback is the wait. We got there before the lunch crowd so only had a 15 min wait.  It was also a little loud.
